mapper.select: select cc.id, cate.name pay_category_name, cate.code pay_category_code, channel.code pay_channel_code, channel.name pay_channel_name from pay_category_channel cc left join pay_category cate on cate.id = cc.category_id and cate.rm_tag = 0 left join pay_channel channel on channel.id = cc.channel_id and channel.rm_tag = 0
